section_full_path: Sign up > New Onboarding > Active Locations
title: Verify Pro is able to complete onboarding flow in Spanish
custom_preconds:
Ensure enhanced_onboarding_experience exp is enabled

Change device language to Spanish

custom_steps_separated.content: Launch app and tap "Create account" -> Proceed to create account in Spanish with or without resume added and/or positions selected.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Pro should be able to create an account in Spanish. 

Onboarding flow in Spanish with resume and positions selected.

Onboarding flow in Spanish without resume and positions selected.
